channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 06/26/2024 # New Features and Improvements # Now users can create workspace in one click Label conversations with channel icon Improve the UI of Table upload options The number of free messages in the free plan has been revised to 100 messages life-time usage 06/13/2024 # New Features and Improvements # Supports LINE card messages and button messages, enriching your conversations. Enhanced User Experience: Improved behavior of adding buttons to lists.
